Hero.title: Welcome to Envoy English
Hero.description: Improve your English conversation skills through live, interactive courses online. Each class features a Mission where you practice speaking in real-life simulations to overcome challenges.

HowItWorks.description: The best way to master a language is to immerse yourself in real-life situations, which often requires traveling abroad. With Envoy English, you can now practice speaking English at your level without leaving your home. Each Mission requires you to learn specific vocabulary, phrases, and strategies. You will then use what you’ve learned to communicate with your teammates and complete a challenge.
HowItWorks.section_tagline_1: Study Your Mission Briefing to Learn Key Phrases and Vocabulary
HowItWorks.section_description_1: Your Mission Briefing contains the words, phrases, and information crucial to your success. Prepare to use these new phrases in your upcoming Mission, and you’ll sound like a native English speaker in no time!
HowItWorks.section_tagline_2: Use Your Language Skills to Solve Problems with Your Teammates
HowItWorks.section_description_2: In order to succeed, you must use all of your English communication skills and the new vocabulary you have learned. You will have to work closely with your teammates to complete each challenge by uncovering clues, asking questions, and agreeing upon a course of action. Your native English instructor will guide you along the way, but the success of the Mission depends on you.
HowItWorks.section_description_3: Each Mission is designed to increase your English speaking level. After the course, your instructor will send you personalized feedback with tips on how to keep improving. As you master the language, you will unlock higher level Missions. Are you up for the challenge?

Curriculum.description: Envoy English uses digital immersion and interactive challenges to improve your English. Each Mission is designed to increase your level of fluency, coherency, interaction, and range of expression, as defined by the internationally recognized Common European Framework of Reference for Languages (CEFR).

Levels.title: Master
Levels.description: You can express yourself spontaneously, very fluently, and precisely.

Levels.title: Ninja
Levels.description: You can use language flexibly and effectively in a wide range of complicated situations.

Levels.title: Ambassador
Levels.description: You can interact easily with native speakers on most topics.

Levels.title: Messenger
Levels.description: You can communicate messages about daily activities and solve problems.

Levels.title: Pioneer
Levels.description: You can communicate to complete simple, routine tasks.

Levels.title: Novice
Levels.description: You can use basic phrases to introduce yourself and ask simple questions

UpcomingMissions.description: Ready to embark on your English speaking journey? Enroll in an upcoming Mission for free. We match you to a team with your right language level.

EmailForm.description: Do you struggle to express yourself in English? Have you had communication problems with international coworkers? Subscribe to our newsletter to learn more. Gain the confidence you need to succeed in your personal and professional goals!

Application.tagline: Find Your Level. Join a Mission. Get Started!
Application.description_1: We are currently accepting applications for our Beta trial. To participate, please fill out the form below. This form will allow us to identify your English level and recommend Missions that are most suitable to you.
Application.description_2: All of our Beta missions are Free! The only requirements are a computer with a camera, microphone, and a strong internet connection. Ready? Get started below.

Audio.header: Get Ready for Your First Class
Audio.tagline: Help us find the right level for you
Audio.description: To finish your application, please submit a 1-3 minute voice recording in English describing a recent trip you went on.
Audio.option_2: Send us a voice message on Whatsapp

FreeTrial.tagline: Sign up for your First Class
FreeTrial.description: Practice your English in an Envoy Training Mission, and learn how to succeed in Envoy English. Get personalized feedback on your current English level and tips on how to improve.

FreeClassCode.tagline: All Missions in the beta program are FREE with your unique discount code.
FreeClassCode.description: Register with a valid credit or debit card today. You will not pay anything - unless you miss a class you signed up for.

Business.tagline: Take your Team's English to the Next Level
Business.description: We offer interactive, online classes that rapidly increase the ability of English learners to communicate effectively in a professional setting. Unlike traditional language classes, our fun, immersive experiences maximize student practice time and ensure that they never get bored of learning.

SpecialOffer.description: For a limited time, we are offering select companies special access to our language training and cultural development program for the first month. Our online courses are designed to meet the needs of busy professionals and give them the skills needed to excel in the global workplace.
SpecialOffer.offer_1: 4 classes led by a native English instructor
SpecialOffer.offer_2: Pre & post assessment of English language & communication skills for all participating employees
SpecialOffer.offer_3: Fun, interactive exercises designed to rapidly improve conversation skills
SpecialOffer.offer_4: Individualized feedback, tips, and strategies for your team to improve

BusinessMissions.title: Envoy Training
BusinessMissions.subtitle: In this introductory Mission, you will learn technology tools and communication strategies to be successful in upcoming Missions.
BusinessMissions.skill_1: Practice introducing yourself to native English speakers. Develop rapport and mutual understanding.
BusinessMissions.skill_2: Learn strategies to use when you don't understand or know what to say in English.
BusinessMissions.skill_3: Learn to use Zoom, a popular video conferencing software.

BusinessMissions.title: The Annual Event
BusinessMissions.subtitle: Your team has been tasked with planning a special event, but not everyone in the company shares the same ideas. Can you work with your team to plan a successful event?
BusinessMissions.skill_1: Brainstorm ideas in a team. Share and summarize information.
BusinessMissions.skill_2: Practice using phrases to express opinions and preferences.
BusinessMissions.skill_3: Use correct tense for planning future events.

BusinessMissions.title: Final Destination
BusinessMissions.subtitle: Your team must travel abroad to present a business proposal to a client, but you encounter some challenges along the way. Can you make it to your final destination on time?
BusinessMissions.skill_1: Practice asking questions to uncover information. Identify and resolve problems.
BusinessMissions.skill_2: Apply vocabulary related to travelling, distance, and schedules.
BusinessMissions.skill_3: Use correct tenses related to missed and upcoming events.

BusinessMissions.title: The Hiring Game
BusinessMissions.subtitle: Your HR director needs your team's help to fill an upcoming vacancy, but not everyone agrees on the ideal candidate. Can you persuade others to make the best hiring decision?
BusinessMissions.skill_1: Describe someone's professional background, educational history, and personality traits.
BusinessMissions.skill_2: Persuade others of your point of view in a professional setting.
BusinessMissions.skill_3: Use adverbs of time to describe periods in the past and present.
